property.name: Rules
property.value: {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Each of your other Abyss get +6000 power and "powered breaker". (A creature that has "powered breaker" breaks an additional shield for each of their 6000 power.) TWINPACT ■ Put one of your Abyss from your graveyard into your mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules1
Rules2
property.value: ■ Put one of your Abyss from your graveyard into your mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, if you have another Armored, draw a card. ■ Your Armored cost 1 less to use. They can't cost 0 or less. ■ Ultra Saver: Armored (When one of your Armored would leave, you may destroy this creature instead.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ While you are summoning this creature, you may return one of your creatures to your hand. If you do, this creature costs 2 less to summon. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {POWERED BLOCKER} +6000 (While blocking, this creature gets +6000 power.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you summon a Mecha creature, you may reduce its cost by 2. If you do, destroy this creature. That Mecha can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ When you put this creature, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this tamaseed is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, tap all your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then if you have 5 or less cards in your mana zone, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your opponent discards a card at random from their hand. ■ Return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.
